content.join: Please get the invitation code from the team creator, use it to join the team.

confirm.title: Confirm removing member.
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to kick out team member "{{user}}"?

confirm.title: Confirm Quit
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to leave the team "{{team}}"?

content.create: You can create a team and invite others to join. Each player can only create one team.

confirm.title: Confirm Disband Team
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to disband team "{{team}}"?

confirm.title: Confirm Transfer
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to transfer team "{{team}}" to "{{user}}"?

no_create.title: You've created a team
no_create.content:
Each player can only create one team.
You can disband the existed team and create a new one.

placeholder.bio: This team is lazy, nothing written

success.title: Successfully created team
success.message: {{team}} has been created, invite your teammates now!

invite_code.copied: Invitation code is copied to clipboard
